name: Immortal Cultivation Hero (Mortal Chapter)
description: Add a castle hero named Han Li, an Elemental City hero named Nangong Wan, a Hell hero named Ziling, a Necropolis hero named Yuan Yao, and a Rampart hero named Jiuxiao.
author: L

1.0.0: Add a castle hero named Han Li, an Elemental City hero named Nangong Wan, a Hell hero named Ziling, a Necropolis hero named Yuan Yao, and a Rampart hero named Jiuxiao.

chinese.name: 修仙英雄（凡人篇）
chinese.description: 添加一个城堡英雄韩立，一个元素城英雄南宫婉，一个地狱英雄紫灵，一个亡灵城元瑶，一个壁垒英雄九霄。
